thread.section_title: OogaLights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OogaLights | oogalights.com
thread.title: Edna

author: Edna
title: Edna
text: I ordered four LED light bulbs, with clear understanding from website about free shipping when typed in SHIPFREE coupon code. I did just that. However, final order page reflected shipping charge, and there is no way to cancel order or exit out. It was too late to contact customer service at night, so I was forced to pay the unexpected shipping charge. I hope there is a good explanation for this deceitful advertisement.
